definition.name: AWS Device Farm Mobile Device Testing GitHub Action
definition.description: GitHub action for automated mobile device testing on AWS Device Farm
definition.author: AWS Device Farm

inputs.name: run-settings-json
inputs.description:
The Run Settings as a json string. The schema for the contents of this file can be found here: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSJavaScriptSDK/v3/latest/Package/-aws-sdk-client-device-farm/Interface/ScheduleRunCommandInput/ The following fields support supplying an ARN or a Name.
  - projectArn
  - devicePoolArn
  - networkProfileArn
  - vpceConfigurationArns
The following fields support supplying an ARN or a path to the file to be found within the repository:
  - appArn
  - testPackageArn
  - testSpecArn
  - extraDataPackageArn
  NOTE: If the file specified is not found in the repo the existing Project Uploads in Device Farm will be searched for one with matching type and name.

inputs.name: artifact-types
inputs.description: (Optional) A comma delimited list of Device Farm Artifacts that should be downloaded after the jobs completes. https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSJavaScriptSDK/v3/latest/Package/-aws-sdk-client-device-farm/Interface/ListArtifactsCommandOutput/ Note: To download all artifact types set the value to ALL. To download none skip this input. They will be downloaded to a folder. The name of the folder can be found by referencing the output with name artifact-folder. Please use the GitHub Action [upload-artifact](https://github.com/actions/upload-artifact) to store them.

inputs.name: upload-poll-interval
inputs.description: (Optional) The duration (in milliseconds) between successive polls for the status of the file upload.

inputs.name: run-poll-interval
inputs.description: (Optional) The duration (in milliseconds) between successive polls for the status of the test run.

outputs.name: arn
outputs.description: The ARN of the AWS Device Farm Automated Test Run

outputs.name: status
outputs.description: The status of the Automated Test Run

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: The result of the Automated Test Run

outputs.name: artifact-folder
outputs.description: The name of the folder that the test artifacts are downloaded into

outputs.name: console-url
outputs.description: The AWS Console URL for the test run

evidence.reasoning: This action is primarily focused on automated mobile device testing, which falls under the Testing category. It also involves deploying tests to AWS Device Farm, linking it to Deployment and Infrastructure categories.
